verses.content: Chun, vântirko pasari berbu pasari chawihai laia pakhat chun a mi biek a. “Hung ta, tui tamtaka ṭhung, nawchizawr ropuitak hremna chu inentir ka ti che.
Hnuoia lalhai chun ama chu an dit hlak a, hnuoia umhai khawm chu a mi dit chîngna uoin chun vai ruiin an um hlak,” a ta.
Chuongchun, ama chun Thla- rauin thlalêrah a mi fepui a; chun, Pathien hrilsietna hminga sip, lu sari le ki sâwm nei, sahrâng seninlâr chunga chuong nuhmei ka hmuh a.
Chu nuhmei chun puon sen duk le sen lâr a sil a, rângkachak le lungmantam le tuikeplungin ân chei a. Rângkachak no, thil tirdakum, a mi dit chîngna thil inthiengnawa sip a chawi a.
A bâwka chun thurûk, “BABU- LON KHAW ROPUI, HNUOIA NAW- CHIZAWRHAI LE THIL TIRDAK- UMHAI NU,” tia hming ziek a um a.
Chun, chu nuhmei chu mi inthienghai thisen le Isu martarhai thisena inruiin ka hmuh a. Ka hmu phingleh mak ka ti bêk bêk a.
Chuongchun, vântirko chun ka kuomah, “Ieng leiin am mak i tih a? Nuhmei le a phurtu sahrâng lu sari le ki sâwm nei thurûk hril ka ti che.

Sahrâng i hmu kha a um ta zet a, a um nâwk ta nawh a; chun, vânsama inthawkin hung suok a ta, bo- hmangnaah fêng a tih. Chun, hnuoia umhai, leihnuoi insieng tîra Hringna Bua hming ziek nawhai chun, sahrâng chu an hmu phâleh, a um ta zeta, a um nâwk ta nawh a, a hung nâwk ding chu mak la tîng an tih.
Hitaka hin lungril varna nei inlang theina a um. Lu sarihai chu nuhmei ṭhungna tlâng pasarihai chu an nih. Lal pasari khawm an na;
pangahai chu an tlâwm tah a, pakhat chu a la um, pakhat chu a la hung um hri nawh a; a hung um pha chun sâwtnawtê um ding a nih.
Chun, sahrâng um ta zeta, um nâwk ta naw ngei khawm kha a parietna a na, pasarihai laia mi kha a ni nghe nghe a; bohmangnaah fêng a tih.
“Chun, ki sâwm i hmuhai kha lal sâwm ram la nei nawhai an nih; dârkâr khat sûng chu sahrâng leh lalhai angin thuneina la hmûng an tih.
Chuongchun, thu hmunkhatin an thilthawtheina le thuneina chu sahrâng pêng an tih.
Chuongchun, Berâmte chu do an ta, chun, Berâmte chu hotuhai Hotu le lalhai Lal a ni leiin anni chu hnêng a tih; chun, a kuoma um, ko- hai, thlanghai, ringumhai chun hne bawk an tih,” a tih a.
Chun, ama bawk chun ka kuomah, “Nawchizawr ṭhungna tui i hmuhai kha, mi dâm, mipui dâm, hnam dâm, ṭawng dâm a nih.
Chun, ki sâwm i hmu le sahrâng chun nawchizawr chu theidâng an ta, iengkhawm neinaw le saruokin siem an tih, a sa khawm fâng an ta, meiin rawhmang an tih.
Pathien thuhai chu a tlung hmakhat chun a dit zâwng an thawna ding le thu thuhmuna an um theina dingin le, an ram chu sahrâng kuoma an pêkna dingin Pathienin an lung- rilah a tir ta sih a.
Chun, i nuhmei hmu kha, khaw ropui, hnuoia lalhai chunga rorêltu chu a nih,” a ta.
